charles_hoskinson.name: Charles Hoskinson
charles_hoskinson.bio: Charles Hoskinson is the CEO and founder of Input Output Global (IOG), the company behind Cardano blockchain.

jeremy_wood.name: Jeremy Wood
jeremy_wood.bio: Jeremy Wood is a co-founder of IOG and has extensive experience in the cryptocurrency industry.

tamara_haasen.name: Tamara Haasen
tamara_haasen.bio: Tamara Haasen serves as the President of IOG.

romain_pellerin.name: Romain Pellerin
romain_pellerin.bio: Romain Pellerin is the Chief Technology Officer at IOG, leading the engineering division.

aggelos_kiayias.name: Aggelos Kiayias
aggelos_kiayias.bio: Aggelos Kiayias is the Chief Scientist at IOG, overseeing academic research initiatives.

joel_telpner.name: Joel Stephan Telpner
joel_telpner.bio: Joel Stephan Telpner serves as the Chief Legal Officer at IOG, handling legal matters for the organization.

gerard_moroney.name: Gerard Moroney
gerard_moroney.bio: Gerard Moroney is the Chief Operating Officer at IOG, overseeing operations.

glenda_shore.name: Glenda Shore
glenda_shore.bio: Glenda Shore is the VP of People Operations at IOG, leading the Human Resources department.

tim_harrison.name: Tim Harrison
tim_harrison.bio: Tim Harrison is the VP of Community & Ecosystem at IOG, handling communications.

mike_ward.name: Mike Ward
mike_ward.bio: Mike Ward serves as the Chief Product Officer at IOG, leading product development efforts.
